parser.database

Class FolgersSQLDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.database.FolgersSQLDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FolgersDatabase

    public class FolgersSQLDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements FolgersDatabase
    This class handles all low-level-activities on the SQL-Database
    Author:
    rom54494

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FolgersSQLDatabase()
      Tries to establish a connection to the database, program exits if this fails because all other parts of the program rely on the database working

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.CharSequence,java.lang.CharSequence> getReplacableNames()
        Description copied from interface: FolgersDatabase

        Specified by:
        getReplacableNames in interface FolgersDatabase
